languageManagementDescription: Manage which languages are available in your application.
languageManagementFutureUpdate: Additional language management features will be available in a future update.
tryDifferentSearchCriteria: Try using different search criteria or clear filters
noRegisteredUsers: There are no registered users in the system yet
disableUserDescription: Disabling this user will prevent them from logging into the system. Any existing sessions will also be terminated. This action can be reversed at any time.
enableUserDescription: Enabling this user will allow them to log in and use the system normally.
translationEditorDescription: Edit translations for different languages and namespaces.
importTranslationsTip: Choose a file to automatically import translations
batchEnableUsersDescription: Are you sure you want to enable {{count}} users? This will allow them to log in to the system.
batchDisableUsersDescription: Are you sure you want to disable {{count}} users? This will prevent them from logging in to the system.
batchSetAdminDescription: Are you sure you want to grant admin privileges to {{count}} users? This will give them full access to the admin area.
batchSetAsAdmins: Batch set selected users as admins
batchRemoveAdminDescription: Are you sure you want to remove admin privileges from {{count}} users? This will revoke their access to the admin area.
batchRemoveAdminRights: Batch remove admin rights from selected users
